20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Umar: Umar said: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) had transaction with the Jews of Khaybar on condition that we should expel them when we wish. If anyone has property (with them), he should take it back, for I am going to expel the Jews. So he expelled them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حُكْمِ أَرْضِ خَيْبَرَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Ruling On The Land Of Khaibar
